note.p: Railway clerk. Born in Ealing, Middlesex. In St Neots, Huntingdonshire, 1881. Married Eleanor Todd (1860–1935) in 1888. In Keighley, Yorkshire, 1891, 1901. Retired to Bedford by 1911.
BMD (Birth index, Marriage index, Death index)
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1610/68/3), 1891 (RG12/3540/81/34), 1901 (RG13/4078/86/19), 1911 (RG14/8839/126)
